page.title: 17PILKINGTON GLASS
page.content: Pilkington glass is an{enormous factory and is very well spaced out I found out that it only coats glass and doesn't make glass as I thought. They sell their coated glass locally. That was one of the reasons they moved here. The name for the coated glass was Kappafloat.The glass when being transported gets wrapped up in foam to protect it.We weren't allowed in the actual place where they coated the glass but we went into the packing deapartment.I expected to see about{50 _ 60}workers but I could only see two .The man that was taking us round said they only employ{35 _ 40 workers.They havn't been here very long and thre aren't any signs of them polluting Great Oakly yet.It advertises in the press.
